message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $175. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $140 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $155.  This would still allow me to make a profit while ensuring you get a great deal on this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
